snippet.title: Asterigos: Curse of The Stars - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description: Join Hilda on her quest in Asterigos: Curse of the Stars, available now on PC, PlayStation, and Xbox. Take another look at combat and the fearsome foes you'll encounter in this launch trailer for the action RPG.
